content.prompt: The reference to “those blues from Memphis” most likely indicates which of the following historical situations in which the advertisement was created?

choices.label: Nativist organizations increased membership and gained national influence.
Internal migration led to new art forms and expression of regional identities.
Suburban communities spread throughout the Sun Belt region.
New technologies gave rise to cinema as mass entertainment.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
